event-group.description: Types of hallucinations the frog will have on collecting rainbow mushroom.
event-group.title: MUSHROOM - RAINBOW

sub-events.comment: Collect the Rocket and launch it setting CountDown
Counting the time down:EverySecond substract 1 from rocketcountdown if it was set
Use left and right arrow keys to control the Frog or tilt the mobile.
Disable Platform behavior when travelling on Rocket
Pin Rocket and move some distance everytick
When rocket time out,Re-Enable the platform behaviour and destroy the rocket.
Collecting mushroom and setting the status
Activate Mushroom on falling(acheived by decreasing the gravity),show a Mushroom to frog
Reset the gravity and when mushroom de-Activated
On landed on Spring give a double push
